content.mainText: Get out a medium size mixing bowl.
Add 2/3 cups of milk. Add 2 eggs. Beat.

tips.title: What is beating?
tips.text: To mix rapidly in order to make a mixture smooth and light by incorporating as much air as possible.

content.mainText: Add 1/4 tsp of cinnamon. Add 1 tsp of vanilla. Beat.

tips.title: What is beating?
tips.text: To mix rapidly in order to make a mixture smooth and light by incorporating as much air as possible.

content.mainText: Put a frying pan on medium heat. Add some oil.
Lightly soak a piece of bread in the mix. Fry it in the pan.

tips.title: How long should I cook it for?
tips.text: Until both sides of the egg-bread are golden.

content.mainText: Lightly soak a slice of bread in the mix. Fry it in the pan.

tips.title: How long should I cook it for?
tips.text: Until both sides of the egg-bread are golden.

content.mainText: Repeat until you're out of mix.
Serve with butter and/or maple syrup.
